synopsis.text:
This heartwarming anime film commemorates the 50th anniversary of the beloved character, Doraemon, and takes viewers on an emotional journey through time with Nobita and his cherished memories of his late grandmother. When Nobita stumbles upon a hand-sewn teddy bear made by his grandmother, a wave of nostalgia washes over him, prompting him to ask Doraemon to travel back in time. The pair's touching reunion with Nobita's grandmother uncovers her heartfelt wish to meet his future bride.

As Nobita and Doraemon venture into the future to fulfill her desire, they find themselves on Nobita's wedding day, only to discover that the groom-to-be has vanished! Plagued by doubts about his worthiness of his bride, Shizuka, the future Nobita had fled the ceremony. Determined to reunite the couple and ensure his grandmother's wish comes true, Nobita and Doraemon embark on a mission to find the missing groom and help him embrace the happiness he deserves. Can Nobita prove to himself and his future self that he is indeed the right person for Shizuka? Join this endearing adventure and find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
